div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 523 Aecaterini (mod. Katerini) environs, (18) near Dium, Macedonia, 1928 Burial: c. 125-120 B.C. ? (T) Contents: c. 600 AR Athens: New Style tetradr. (Kambanis saw 87, latest Demeas-Hermokles) Disposition: dispersed Thompson, Athens, pp. 521-2
